title:u/pandapaxxy's Sundial controller breakdown
description:Originally found at https://old.reddit.com/r/sharditkeepit/comments/eazbhn/sundial_weapons_controller_breakdown/

// Steelfeather Repeater (PvE / controller)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / controller): "One of a few rapid-fire autos to get random rolls in Destiny 2. And the only one to be kinetic gives you a reason to grind this seasonal gun. In PvE it has the best damage perks and reload perk through MKC and Feeding Frenzy." Recommended MW - Range or Reload.

// Steelfeather Repeater (PvE / controller)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / controller): "One of a few rapid-fire autos to get random rolls in Destiny 2. And the only one to be kinetic gives you a reason to grind this seasonal gun. In PvE it has the best damage perks and reload perk through MKC and Feeding Frenzy." Recommended MW - Range or Reload.

// Steelfeather Repeater (PvP / controller)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / controller): "In PvP it will be a bullet hose, quick to down enemies but also pretty underwhelming when it comes to optimal builds. [...] With Swashbuckler and Firmly Planted you’ll have a very easy time killing others, but I don’t think it will shake up the meta unless autos get another buff." Recommended MW - Range or Stability.

// Steelfeather Repeater (PvP / controller)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / controller): "In PvP it will be a bullet hose, quick to down enemies but also pretty underwhelming when it comes to optimal builds. [...] With Swashbuckler and Firmly Planted you’ll have a very easy time killing others, but I don’t think it will shake up the meta unless autos get another buff." Recommended MW - Range or Stability.

// Patron of Lost Causes (PvE / controller)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / controller): "Not exactly ideal, but for specific builds or speed runs I can see this being a potential choice." Recommended MW - Reload.

// Patron of Lost Causes (PvE / controller)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / controller): "Not exactly ideal, but for specific builds or speed runs I can see this being a potential choice." Recommended MW - Reload.

// Patron of Lost Causes (PvP / controller)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / controller): "In PvP you can cause some serious flinch with a 200 RPM Explosive Payload scout rifle. Paired with an easier shot through Rapid Hit and you’ve really got a dream scout." Recommended MW - Range.

// Patron of Lost Causes (PvP / controller)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / controller): "In PvP you can cause some serious flinch with a 200 RPM Explosive Payload scout rifle. Paired with an easier shot through Rapid Hit and you’ve really got a dream scout." Recommended MW - Range.

// Breachlight  (PvE / controller)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / controller): "A new aggressive burst sidearm, the first one since Forsaken launched the new archetype. It hasn’t ever been a jack of all trades, but it does have some interesting rolls that put it above Smuggler’s Word. Namely Demo and MKC." Recommended MW - Reload.

// Breachlight  (PvE / controller)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / controller): "A new aggressive burst sidearm, the first one since Forsaken launched the new archetype. It hasn’t ever been a jack of all trades, but it does have some interesting rolls that put it above Smuggler’s Word. Namely Demo and MKC." Recommended MW - Reload.
